clauses.title: Content is published under a free license instead of a bilateral one
clauses.description: User-generated content, such as posts or comments, is published under a free license, meaning other users can reuse it (e.g. Creative Commons license).
clauses.clause_text: Unless otherwise noted, the original content on this website is made available under a CC0 1.0 Universal Public Domain Dedication.

case.text: Content is published under a free license instead of a bilateral one

clauses.title: Logs are deleted after a finite period of time
clauses.description: Logs are text files containing some information about web visitors, such as user agents (showing for instance that you're connecting from Firefox for Android) and ip addresses (which reveal your approximate location). This case applies to Services that periodically delete their logs to prevent user sessions being tracked over time.
clauses.clause_text: Raw data such as pages visited, anonymized visitor IPs, and visitor actions will be retained for 60 days.

case.text: Logs are deleted after a finite period of time

clauses.title: Your personal data is used for limited purposes
clauses.description: Your Personal Data is only used for the essential purposes of the Service, which are clearly defined on the Agreements. For instance, the Service won't abuse your data to deliver targeted advertisements to you or for marketing purposes.
clauses.clause_text:
We use your account data to identify you on the website, and to create pages specific to you, such as your profile page. We will also use your account data to publish a public profile for you on our services.

We use your email to:

  • Notify you about posts and other activity on the websites or services.

case.text: Your personal data is used for limited purposes

clauses.title: Only necessary logs are kept by the service to ensure quality
clauses.description: Logs are text files containing some information about web visitors, such as user agents (showing for instance that you're connecting from Firefox for Android) and ip addresses (which reveal your approximate location). This case applies to Services that only keep the strictly necessary logs on their servers and therefore protect your privacy.
clauses.clause_text: This data is processed under our Legitimate Interest to provide our services to you in a an efficient and secure manner and to ensure the legal compliance and proper administration of our business.

case.text: Only necessary logs are kept by the service to ensure quality

clauses.title: Archives of their agreements are provided so that changes can be viewed over time
clauses.description: This case applies to Services whose agreements provide previous versions, so that users can compare them and understand how the Service seems to evolve regarding user rights.
clauses.clause_text: A full revision history for this page can be found on GitHub

case.text: Archives of their agreements are provided so that changes can be viewed over time

clauses.title: Information is provided about how they collect personal data
clauses.description: The service details situations in which they collect personal information or means by which they do.
clauses.clause_text: How does Privacy Guides collect data about me?

case.text: Information is provided about how they collect personal data

clauses.title: No need to register
clauses.description: This service can be used without providing a user profile.

case.text: No need to register

clauses.title: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data
clauses.description: Users have the right to access personal data hold by the Service, correct it and/or permanently delete it. This usually applies to Services GDPR compliants.
clauses.clause_text:
Every user is entitled to the following:

  • The right to access – You have the right to request access to your personal data, or copies of your personal data from us. We may charge you a small fee for providing a copy of your data.
  • The right to rectification – You have the right to request that we correct any information you believe is inaccurate or incomplete.
  • The right to erasure – You have the right to request that we erase your personal data, under certain conditions.

case.text: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data

clauses.title: IP addresses of website visitors are not tracked
clauses.description: The Service disclaims that IP adresses from users are not collected (or anonymized) nor shared.
clauses.clause_text: Your anonymized IP address: We anonymize the last 3 bytes of your IP, e.g. 192.xxx.xxx.xxx.

case.text: IP addresses of website visitors are not tracked

clauses.title: You can retrieve an archive of your data
clauses.description: Users can request a copy of the data collected through the services and infer from it the amount of personal information that is processed and stored by the Service. This usually applies to Services GDPR compliants.
clauses.clause_text: The right to data portability – You have the right to request that we transfer the data that we have collected to another organization, or directly to you, under certain conditions.

case.text: You can retrieve an archive of your data

clauses.title: Details are provided about what kind of information they collect
clauses.description: The Privacy Policy describes in detail the data collected through the website and through the services provided.

case.text: Information is provided about what kind of information they collect

clauses.title: The service is open-source
clauses.description: The code of the software is open-source and the users can have access to the source code.
clauses.clause_text:
.

Privacy Guides is an open source project

case.text: The service is open-source

clauses.title: The service claims to be GDPR compliant for European users
clauses.description: The service has a different behavior towards users protected by the GDPR.
clauses.clause_text:
We respect privacy rights under Regulation (EU) 2016/679, the European Union’s General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).
Information that GDPR requires us to give can be found throughout this document.

case.text: The service claims to be GDPR compliant for European users

clauses.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time
clauses.description: You can stop using the service and/or cancel or delete your account at any time for any reason. Moreover, the termination is reasonably fast and simple.
clauses.clause_text: We will store your account data as long as your account remains open. After closing an account, we may retain some or all of your account data in the form of backups or archives for up to 90 days

case.text: You have the right to leave this service at any time

clauses.title: Spidering, crawling, or accessing the site through any automated means is not allowed
clauses.clause_text:
You must not conduct any systematic or automated data collection activities on or in relation to this website without express written consent from Aragon Ventures LLC, including:

  • Excessive Automated Scans
  • Denial of Service Attacks
  • Scraping
  • Data Mining
  • ‘Framing’ (IFrames)

case.text: Spidering, crawling, or accessing the site through any automated means is not allowed

clauses.title: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at your sole risk
clauses.description: This service does not provide any guarantees as to its usability or fitness for the users' purposes. Users agree to use it at their own risk, accepting any possible bugs, malfunctions or harm to their devices.
clauses.clause_text: the Privacy Guides project and website is offered “as-is”

case.text: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at your sole risk

clauses.title: You agree not to use the service for illegal purposes
clauses.description: The user agrees not to commit any unlawful acts through the use of the website, including the posting of illegal content or messaging.
clauses.clause_text:
When you contribute to this repository you are doing so under the above licenses.

Section 3

Acceptable Use

You may not use this website in any way that causes or may cause damage to the website or impairment of the availability or accessibility of Privacy Guides, or in any way which is unlawful, illegal, fraudulent, or harmful, or in connection with any unlawful, illegal, fraudulent, or harmful purpose or activity.

case.text: You agree not to use the service for illegal purposes

clauses.title: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics
clauses.description: Your personal data is used for statistics in a de-identified/aggregated form (i.e. not directly linked to a unique identity) to analyse trends, for research and for analytics.
clauses.clause_text: We store aggregate statistics about use of the websites and services we host indefinitely, but those statistics do not include data identifiable to you personally.

case.text: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics

clauses.title: The service does not guarantee accuracy or reliability of the information provided
clauses.description: This service makes no warranty regarding the accuracy or reliability of any information that is given on its website or the results that may be obtained from the use of the service.
clauses.clause_text: Privacy Guides does not warrant or make any representations concerning the accuracy, likely results, or reliability of the use of the materials on the website

case.text: The service does not guarantee accuracy or reliability of the information provided

clauses.title: This service is a subsidiary of Aragon Ventures
clauses.description: The service is a subsidiary of a certain company (called X in the title, to be replaced by the parent Company in each point's title). Company X’s Terms of Service may apply to the service.
